history.proof: unfold PS_incr_n. destruct (le_lt_dec n k) as [Hle | Hlt]. - shelve. - shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n, k : nat Hle : (n <= k)%nat Unable to unify "a (k - n)%nat" with "(fix PS_incr_n (a : nat -> V) (n k : nat) {struct n} : V := match n with | 0%nat => a k | S n0 => PS_incr_1 (PS_incr_n a n0) k end) a n k".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: AbsRing
V: NormedModule K
a: nat -> V
k: nat
n: nat

Goal:
PS_incr_n a n k = (if le_lt_dec n k then a (k - n)%nat else zero)

Premises:
zero = fun G : AbelianGroup => AbelianGroup.zero G (AbelianGroup.class G) : forall G : AbelianGroup, G Argument G is implicit and maximally inserted
Notation NormedModule := NormedModule.type
PS_incr_n = fix PS_incr_n (a : nat -> V) (n k : nat) {struct n} : V := match n with | 0%nat => a k | S n0 => PS_incr_1 (PS_incr_n a n0) k end : (nat -> V) -> nat -> nat -> V Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope nat_scope]
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
le_lt_dec : forall n m : nat, {(n <= m)%nat} + {(m < n)%nat}
filterdiff_const : forall a0 : ?V, filterdiff (fun _ : ?U => a0) ?F (fun _ : ?U => zero) where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?U : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_norm_zero : forall f : ?U -> ?V, filterlim (fun x : ?U => norm (f x)) ?F (locally 0) -> filterlim f ?F (locally zero) where ?U : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- Type] ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- Filter ?F]
filterdiff_ext_lin : forall f l1 l2 : ?U -> ?V, filterdiff f ?F l1 -> (forall y : ?U, l1 y = l2 y) -> filterdiff f ?F l2 where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?U : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- Filter ?F]
linear_zero : forall l : ?U -> ?V, is_linear l -> l zero = zero where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?U : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K]
filterlim_locally_ball_norm : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball_norm y eps (f x))) where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?T : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- Type] ?U : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- Filter ?F]
filterdiff_plus_fct : forall f g lf lg : ?U -> ?V, filterdiff f ?F lf -> filterdiff g ?F lg -> filterdiff (fun u : ?U => plus (f u) (g u)) ?F (fun u : ?U => plus (lf u) (lg u)) where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?U : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- Filter ?F]
linear_scal : forall l : ?U -> ?V, is_linear l -> forall (k0 : ?K) (x : ?U), l (scal k0 x) = scal k0 (l x) where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?U : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_ge_0 : forall x : ?V, 0 <= norm x where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K]
filterdiff_iter_plus_fct : forall (l : list ?I) (f df : ?I -> ?U -> ?V), ?U -> (forall j : ?I, List.In j l -> filterdiff (f j) ?F (df j)) -> filterdiff (fun y : ?U => Iter.iter plus zero l (fun j : ?I => f j y)) ?F (fun x0 : ?U => Iter.iter plus zero l (fun j : ?I => df j x0)) where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?U : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K] ?I : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat ->...-> V n : nat k : nat |- Filter ?F]
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- Type] ?F : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- Filter ?F]
norm_eq_zero : forall x : ?V, norm x = 0 -> x = zero where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_opp : forall x : ?V, norm (opp x) = norm x where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K]
tech3 : forall (k : R) (N : nat), k <> 1 -> sum_f_R0 (fun i : nat => k ^ i) N = (1 - k ^ S N) / (1 - k)
scal_zero_l : forall u : ?V, scal zero u = zero where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- Ring] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- ModuleSpace ?K]
scal_zero_r : forall x : ?K, scal x zero = zero where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- Ring] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- ModuleSpace ?K]
ball_norm_eq : forall x y : ?V, (forall eps : posreal, ball_norm x eps y) -> x = y where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_triangle : forall x y : ?V, norm (plus x y) <= norm x + norm y where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K]
is_derive_const : forall (a0 : ?V) (x : ?K), is_derive (fun _ : ?K => a0) x zero where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_compat1 : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : R), norm (minus y x) < eps -> ball x eps y where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_scal : forall (l : ?K) (x : ?V), norm (scal l x) <= abs l * norm x where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K]
eq_is_derive : forall (f : R -> ?V) (a0 b : R), (forall t : R, a0 <= t <= b -> is_derive f t zero) -> a0 < b -> f a0 = f b where ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
Build_is_linear : forall l : ?U -> ?V, (forall x y : ?U, l (plus x y) = plus (l x) (l y)) -> (forall (k0 : ?K) (x : ?U), l (scal k0 x) = scal k0 (l x)) -> (exists M : R, 0 < M /\ (forall x : ?U, norm (l x) <= M * norm x)) -> is_linear l where ?K : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbsRing] ?U : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K] ?V : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- NormedModule ?K]
Rabs = fun r : R => if Rcase_abs r then - r else r : R -> R Argument scope is [R_scope]
plus_zero_l : forall x : ?G, plus zero x = x where ?G : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbelianGroup]
minus_zero_r : forall x : ?G, minus x zero = x where ?G : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbelianGroup]
plus_zero_r : forall x : ?G, plus x zero = x where ?G : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbelianGroup]
plus_opp_l : forall x : ?G, plus (opp x) x = zero where ?G : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbelianGroup]
plus_opp_r : forall x : ?G, plus x (opp x) = zero where ?G : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbelianGroup]
opp_minus : forall x y : ?G, opp (minus x y) = minus y x where ?G : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbelianGroup]
plus_assoc : forall x y z : ?G, plus x (plus y z) = plus (plus x y) z where ?G : [K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat k : nat |- AbelianGroup]
tech6 : forall (An : nat -> R) (k : R) (N : nat), 0 <= k -> (forall i : nat, An (S i) < k * An i) -> sum_f_R0 An N <= An 0%nat * sum_f_R0 (fun i : nat => k ^ i) N
tech2 : forall (An : nat -> R) (m n : nat), (m < n)%nat -> sum_f_R0 An n = sum_f_R0 An m + sum_f_R0 (fun i : nat => An (S m + i)%nat) (n - S m)
Init.Nat.sub = fix sub (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0%nat => n | S k => match m with | 0%nat => n | S l => sub k l end end : nat -> nat -> nat Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
Rlt_Rminus : forall a b : R, a < b -> 0 < b - a
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
gt = fun n m : nat => (m < n)%nat : nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
ge = fun n m : nat => (m <= n)%nat : nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
gt_le_S : forall n m : nat, (m > n)%nat -> (S n <= m)%nat
PS_incr_1 = fun (a : nat -> V) (n : nat) => match n with | 0%nat => zero | S n0 => a n0 end : (nat -> V) -> nat -> V Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope]

```coq
unfold PS_incr_n. destruct (le_lt_dec n k) as [Hle | Hlt].
- apply eq_refl.
- reflexivity.
Qed.```
